sections.title: Two months before release - steps to take
content: This section covers information for those two months before release.
Each section below will guide you with applications and information gathering.

sections.title: Applying for jobs - a start!
content: It is now a good time to:
Start thinking about applying for jobs. You can do this with Jobcentre Plus or with a job club or employment hub if your prison has one.
In some prisons you can apply for voluntary work in the community.
Get valid photo ID from Resettlement or try CitizenCard
Talk to your probation officer to get addresses for support networks in the area you are moving to.
Contact HMRC to get documents that show your name and National Insurance number if you donâ€™t already have your NI number. Call on 0300 200 3500. Their written reply should arrive within 15 days.
